sandra.libs.asr.asrlib
Class ASR

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper

              android.app.Activity
                  sandra.libs.asr.asrlib.ASR
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.speech.RecognitionListener, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback
Direct Known Subclasses:
ASRWithLib, Derek, DialogInterpreter, DialogInterpreter, Jack, NLU, Stacy, VoiceLaunch, VoiceSearch, VoiceSearchConfirmation
public abstract class ASR
extends android.app.Activity
implements android.speech.RecognitionListener

Abstract class for automatic speech recognition Encapsulates the management of the speech recognition engine. All the methods necessary to set up and run the speech recognizer are implemented in this class. Only the methods for processing the ASR output are abstract, so that each app using the ASRLib can specify a different behavior.

Version:
2.4, 11/24/13
Author:
Zoraida Callejas, Michael McTear
